name: The Spirit Whisperer
description:
ARI´S JOURNEY EPISODE 01

There are rumours of an ancient song that attracts the spirits to the human world
Some of them have heard the call. What could attract here those spirits of old?
An autumn morning fog. 
A tower on the clouds. 
A whisper within a song.

This is the first episode of a tryptich - 3600x4500px
